white: The big statue of the kid holding ice cream in Paradise Falls.
Losing a companion to a ridiculously obvious trap.
Penance at the Church of the Children of Atom.
Having a bad reputation with every faction.
Getting scared by unexpected kill cams.
That one crazed-looking Khan with a Mohawk in the beginning of New Vegas.
The old lady gang attacking you with rolling pins.
Playing "I've got our nose!" with a Ghoul.
THE TESLA COILS. THE COILS OF TESLA.
Boone doing a sick MLG 360 No-Scope.
Disturbingly large amount of hula dancer figurines.
Accidentally wearing the wrong faction armor and getting shot.
The same guitar riff that plays before every Ink Spots song.
A Radscorpion now missing its stinger.
Enough Nuka Cola to choke a Brahmin.
Carol and Greta, the lesbian Ghouls in Underworld.
Accidentally killing a Radroach with a mini nuke.
All the loading screens inside New Vegas.
Old copies of Grognak the Barbarian.
The green filter over the Capital Wasteland's environment.
Being weirdly attracted to the Lone Wanderer's dad.
Drinking and swimming at the same time.
Racing Radscorpions hopped up on Psycho.
An all-expense paid vacation to Evergreen Mills.
The broken door that still requires a lock-pick skill of 100 to open.
Hearing that one song on the radio three times in a row.
Your dad scolding you for blowing up Megaton.
Joshua Graham never running out of .45's to reload.
Not being able to wear the power armor.
The irony of Liam Neeson's daughter having to find HIM for once.
Using a license plate as shoulder armor.
That one NCR Ranger that barfs on the Gomorrah sign.
The fire inside burning brighter than the fire around.
Spurs that go jingle jangle jingle.
Killing the NCR Rangers to get their dogtags.
Fighting every opponent in The Thorn to the sound of the John Cena music.
Wondering how Little Lamplight continues to maintain a population.
Drinking 15 Sunset Sarsaparillas in a row.
Stealing from a bus full of dead children.
All the tin cans around the Wasteland.
Having too much luck and getting kicked out of casinos.
The skeleton in the bathtub with the toaster.
Sneaking around Father Elijah with all the Sierra Madre gold.
The pile of corpses of Freeside thugs.
Stained copies of the D.C. Journal of internal Medicine.
Finding a skull in the toilet.
Dressing as the Ant Agonizer for personal jollies.
Getting kidnapped by the Master and turned into a Super Mutant.
Wanting to sleep with every antagonistic character.
A massive army of Super Mutants in the downtown D.C. area.
Having a bag filled with a few thousand bottle caps.
Using your Pip-Boy and stopping time.
Liam Neeson, Matthew Perry, and Felicia Day.
The amber filter over the Mojave environment.
That incredibly long walk to Jacobstown.
A nice pair of Charlie's Big Jiggly Brahmin Udders.
Getting blown up outside of Nellis AFB.
Mr. Gutsy modified to play Vocaloid tunes.
Getting blinded by the light when you exit Vault 101.
Your lovely time at American High School.
Smelling that air, drinking it like BOOZE.
Throwing Lee Oliver off the side of the dam.
The satisfaction of placing a mine in Moriarty's pocket.
Lighting your second in command on fire and throwing him into the Grand Canyon.
The Great Khan's encampment on the other side of the Deathclaw nest.
The Super Mutant with the Gatling laser running right for you.
A wild night with Fisto the Love Protectron.
Three Mirelurks, two Robobrains, and a Mole Rat ashamed of itself.
Papa Khan with a daddy kink.
Pleasuring Fire Ants while the Ink Spots play in the background.
Doctor Li thirsting over the Lone Wanderer's dad.
Putting your Pip-Boy on the wrong arm.
The soothing sounds of Mr. New Vegas.
Getting awkwardly turned on by Glowing Ones.
Forgetting to turn off your Pip-Boy's light.
Dinner with the White Glove Society.
The Lone Wanderer's intense desire to hoard butter knives.
Getting enough bad karma to recruit Jericho.
The half-naked girls playing in the fountain outside of the Ultra-Luke.
The sexual tension between the Ant Agonizer and the Mechanist.
Using the Mechanist's armor to build a sexbot.
Wearing only sexy sleepwear and carrying a rocket launcher.
Adding a robo-dick to one of Mr. Gutsy's tentacles.
Being way too over-leveled for this shit.
Your enemies exploding into little bloody pieces.
Being way too under-leveled for this shit.
Antony naming one of his dogs "Slut".
